attributes.action: Make all use of personal data conditional
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Data use should be conditional on the provision of a copy of that data to each individual or his agent,  each year on his/her birthday,  together with a full record of who had access to it. This should enable the data subject to check the data and challenge errors.   This condition should apply to all users of data, including commercial entities and government departments.
